description: Investors are happy with Apple's latest business performance, but the big question is what happens when the company runs out of buyers for its high-end phones and tablets?
title: Apple keeps its shine
teaser: Investors are happy with Apple's latest business performance, but the big question is what happens when the company runs out of buyers for its high-end phones and tablets?
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 24, 2013
contentencoded:
Apple released its latest businees results yesterday, and they were better than many analysts expected. iPhone sales? Nearly two million over estimates with 31 million sold in the last three months. The big question is what happens when the company runs out of buyers for its high-end phones and tablets.

Gartner analyst Carolina Milanesi joins Marketplace Tech host Ben Johnson to discuss.
